wordGroup: tonal range 色调范围；音频频段

sentences.en: Its general effect was soft edged and tonal.
sentences.cn: 它的整体效果是柔和的边缘和色调。

sentences.en: There is little tonal variety in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音中几乎没有声调的变化。

sentences.en: Languages in East Asia tend to have tonal vowels, and those of the north-eastern Caucasus are known for consonantal complexity: Ubykh has 78 consonant sounds.
sentences.cn: 东亚的语言往往有带声调的元音，而东北高加索地区的语言以辅音复杂而闻名：尤比克语有78个辅音。
